properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:38AM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 7
inches.

* WHERE...Beaver County.

* WHEN...Until noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds of 20 to 25 MPH with higher
gusts may cause areas of blowing snow along with sharply
reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY FOR THE EASTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE
